runs.comm: bouncer first up, Masakadza pops underneath it
short ball again, not quite as short though and Masakadza flaps it into the leg side for a single
much fuller this time, but the line is wrong, clipping the pad on its way through to Kuhn
just about the right length and line, Taylor opens the face and glides a single
Masakadza deep into his crease and mistiming a back-foot drive into the covers, scampers through for a single
lovely shot, really authoritative cut shot races to the point boundary
poor start from Tsotsobe, short and wide and Masakadza has clattered it, throwing everything behind his cut shot to send it on its way
back of a length, tighter line though this time and Masakadza drives to cover
really good batting this! Excellent stuff, giving himself room to free his arms, Tsotsobe obliges with a short one and he flays a cut shot to the cover boundary
gone this time! The fun is over for Masakadza! Fuller ball, aimed a booming drive down the ground but it got a bit high on the bat and Botha held to a tough chance running back from mid-off
good batting from Taylor, just turning it behind square on the leg side
Chamu Chibhabha. who played so well in the first game, carefully defends his first delivery to cover
Taylor nudges again into the leg side, wants two but a loud "nooo" from Chibhabha persuades his against it
Chibhabha very confidently forward and pushing into cover for a single
tip and run from Taylor, dropping into the off side and setting off for a single straight away
dug in much shorter, too short for the umpire's liking
single taken pushed into space
top work from Taylor! Coming at the bowler and collecting a boundary, excellent batting
Chibhabha opens the face and guides a single towards third man
banged in very short, Taylor aims a big hook shot and misses
beaten! Fuller length and Taylor has an aimless fence at it outside off
much better this time from Taylor, solidly pushing to cover and setting off for one
touch shorter from Tsotsobe, steered down to third man who fumbles but it's still just a single

Taylor aimed big here, and actually got into the right position against the ball he would have wanted, but he was a touch too eager and was through the shot before the ball had arrived, in the end it was skewed into the off side
Rusty Theron is into the attack and begins by sliding one into the pads which Taylor knocks to deep square for a couple
touch shorter, the batsman aimed a cut shot but there wasn't enough room for it and ended up mistiming to point
Chibhabha this time tries to cut but can't get much of it and the bowler collects
ooh, this is close, Chibhabha trying to smash down the ground, can't get much of it and just clears mid-off to collect a single
very secure from Taylor, pushing with a full-face down the ground for a single
Chibhabha down the wicket, turns a length ball into a low full toss and bunts down the ground for a single
oops, not a great effort from the ex-captain at point, missing a regulation save and allowing a well-timed cut to go for four
dug in much shorter in response from the bowler and Chibhabha is up on his toes to defend
a touch too side here from Tsotsobe and Chibhabha can't reach it
banged in very short indeed, Chibhabha jumps to hook and can't connect
hacked into the leg side, not pretty, but fairly effective as Chibhabha finds a single to midwicket
top shot, really classy shot from Taylor, fuller and slower ball, Taylor punched it crisply over mid-on for four
Taylor will feel like he's missed out here, touch of width and he mistimes a cut to cover
decent start from the skipper, on a length and line, Chibhabha chips down the wicket and drives firmly to long-off
Taylor tries to fiddle this down the ground but the bowler collects
shot! Lovely shot from Taylor, skipping down the wicket and punching a huge six over the bowler's head
worked into space, good follow-up to the boundary
Chibhabha picks a single this time, these two are going well
two to finish the over, excellent batting from Taylor and good running too
Chibhabha tries to skip down the wicket and drive inside-out through cover, gets an inside edge the skews into the midwicket region for a couple
have that! What a strike from Chibhabha! Clears his front leg and thwacks this over the cow-corner boundary
trouble for Chibhabha as he pushes to cover and sets off for one, he's sent back by Taylor straight away but it takes a big dive to get home in time
once again Chibhabha picks out cover, but this time there is no single attempted
nicely played here, nurdled into the leg side for a single
six more! 50 partnership up in style, very ugly short ball that Taylor slaps into the stands over square leg
clipped straight to midwicket
Chibhabha  advances and Botha fires in a yorker in response, good bowling
shot, excellent batting from Chibhabha, gets inside the line and sweeps powerfully to the fine-leg boundary
single taken this time, fiddled into the leg side
six more! Small boundaries here but that's still an excellent shot, Taylor chipping down the crease and easing a full-faced lofted drive into the sightscreen
carefully defended to finish the over
big sweep from Chibhabha, finds a man on the midwicket boundary
with the fielders scattered there are plenty of singles available, Taylor collecting one down the leg side
another sweep attempted, finds short fine leg
down the track, clipped into the leg side and some sluggish fielding allows them to come back for a second
Taylor trying to clear his front leg to find a big sweep shot but he can't quite get the power and only gets one
good over from Peterson, excellent over, Chibhabha slaps down the ground for a single to finish
Duminy is into the attack, he bowled dreadfully in the first game... and starts very badly here, dragging down a long-hop that Chibhabha slams over the midwicket fence
four more! What a series Chibhabha is having! Poor delivery again and Chibhabha sweeps firmly behind square for four
poor fielding allows two more now, Chibhabha clipping into the leg side where a fumble gives the chance of two
ugly delivery, really short and Chibhabha has no choice but to smash it out of sight in front of deep square
carefully defended this time into the leg side
single to finish a damaging over for South Africa. At this stage South Africa were 92-3! This is really top work from these two
starts with a short ball that Chibhabha hops to defend into the off side to scamper one
Taylor gets away with this! Short ball and he mistimed the pull shot horribly but it bounced short of mid-on
good work from Theron here, fullish length and Taylor's drive founds mid-off
having bowled three good balls, Theron drops short, Chibhabha takes full toll, punching it square of the wicket in the off side to bring up a brilliant fifty
this was a bit of an ugly hack, slapping the ball back at the bowler
good finish to the over, full and straight, clips a mixture of bat and pad, runs out into the off side for a single

oh dear, how has this gone for four! Another misfield, this time from Theron at short fine leg, Chibhabha bottom-edged a sweep shot, Theron  was wrong-footed and ended up missing it allowing it to go to the fine-leg boundary
shortish ball, Theron clips it neatly to deep square
Taylor less expansive, just nudging into the leg side off the pads to rotate the strike
Chibhabha works a single into space
fired down the leg side, Taylor aimed a big sweep but couldn't connect
this time Taylor finds enough bat on ball to get a single

Chibhabha falls! Big strike for South Africa! Botha round the wicket and landing a length ball that Chibhabha tried to swing into the stands over cow corner, didn't quite time it and ended up caught on the boundary
Tsotsobe into the attack at the new batsman Coventry, it's short and Coventry has to hop to defend
bouncer this time, and how that's not a wide I don't know
wow! That's how to play yourself in! Short ball from Tsotsobe again and Coventry has smashed it on to the roof at cow-corner
gives himself a bit of room and guides to Botha at point
ooh, bit of a nothing shot this from Taylor, fiddling outside off stump and missing
good batting from Taylor and he scampers two to bring up an excellent fifty off 32 balls, clipping down the ground with a flick of the wrists
pushed away down the ground
brilliant stuff from Taylor, really classy stuff, skipping down the ground, getting inside the line and flicking a drive into space at extra cover, timed it perfectly and collects four
follows up the boundary with a single knocked into the leg side

Coventry falls! Important strike for South Africa, just got defeated by some extra spin as he gave himself room to hit into the leg side, ended up following the ball and lifting it straight to mid-off
Taylor down on one knee and sweeping without much power for a single
pushed to extra cover for a single
Parnell starts a new over with a slower ball that's worked off the gloves down the leg side
wide swung down the leg side, that'll do Zimbabwe no harm at all
not the prettiest shot you'll ever see as Chigumbura stands tall and slugs to mid-off
good slower ball, Taylor tries to drop and run into the off side but no single in available
very nicely driven but a rare piece of good fielding from South Africa, an excellent diving stop at cover keeps it to one
just a single again, pushed into the cover region
Taylor squeezes out a yorker down the ground and collects a single

all over for Taylor! That could be it for Zimbabwe! Taylor was trying to land his inside-out drive but got too much height and not enough power on it, there was almost a collision on the cover boundary but Theron held on firm
good stuff from Chigumbura, getting down on one knee to slap a sweep shot away
very short from Peterson but he's reprieved by the extra turn that surprises the batsman
well outside leg stump Chigumbura only connects with the back of his bat on a sweep shot to collect a single
pushed into space at cover for a single
Chigumbura on the sweep again but it's nicely bowled, held back a fraction, and the batsman can't connect
starts well, pushing it across the left hander and Dabengwa misses
another one goes, Dabengwa this time, trying to land a booming drive down the ground, doesn't get hold of it and Duminy snaffles the chance on the long-on boundary
this is eagerly pushed down the ground but it will only be a single
once again it's just a single, clipped neatly into the midwicket region
big strike this, slower ball dragged down short, begging to be put away and Chigumbura obliged in fine style, beating it over midwicket
better ball to finish off which is driven to long-on for one
full toss from Parnell, no ball too, Zimbabwe need plenty more of these, Chigumbura stood still and clunked it straight of deep square for four free hit coming up...
The free hit is punished! Chigumbura standing tall and thwacking to the deep midwicket boundary
Chigumbura wants two but can't get it, swishing without much timing to long-on
well well well! That'll do nicely! Hip-high full toss, Taibu flicks it handsomely, it goes a long way over deep square for six! Zimbabwe right in this now!
much better from Parnell, finds the yorker length and Taibu can only squeeze it away for a single

oh no! Suicide for Chigumbura! Smashes a full toss out to Theron at deep point, a single was all that was on offer but he tried to come back for the second and never looked like making it. Big blow, he was well set
Masakadza clips his first ball straight to short midwicket, takes a single and Zimbabwe need 15 from the final over
gone! Middle and leg stump out the ground! Masakadza gave himself plenty of room but couldn't connect as the yorker splattered the stumps. Dot ball as well
good ball again, finds the yorker, Cremer times it nicely, but just for a single to deep cover
how they have managed two there I don't know, Taibu bunted a full toss to long-on and scampered back for two
excellent bowling again, consistently finding the yorker and not much Taibu can do
really good effort from Theron, lands another fullish ball that Cremer swings to midwicket
that'll be all. Full and straight to finish, Taibu takes a leg bye that brings up Zimbabwe's highest T20 score against a Test nation but South Africa take the match and series
